# init(objects:)

**Initializer**

Initializes and returns an activity items configuration with the specified objects.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor init(objects: [any NSItemProviderWriting])
```

## Creating an activity items configuration

- **init(itemProviders:)**: Initializes and returns an activity items configuration with the specified item providers.

items.description: Initializes and returns an activity items configuration with the specified item providers.
items.name: init(itemProviders:)
